atlantis.parsersÂ¶

atlantis.parsers subpackage contains some modules devoted to Atlantis PBEM text files parsing. Up to the date only two Atlantis PBEM files are parsed: report file and orders file.

Each module in atlantis.parsers defines classes needed to parse one of these files. The structure is similar for all of them: there’s a parser class which is in charge of parsing input lines and calls its consumer with the parsed data; and a consumer interface called by the parser which needs to be implemented by any class willing to consume data generated by the parser.

In addition some helper classes may be defined, also. For example atlantis.parsers.reportparser defines a ReportReader class to unwrap report lines before being parsed by ReportParser.

Modules in atlantis.parsers package:

atlantis.parsers.reportparser This module implements all classes needed to parse report files.
atlantis.parsers.ordersparser This module implements all classes needed to parse order files.

Contents of atlantis.parsers package:

  • atlantis.parsers.reportparser
    • ReportReader
    • ReportConsumer
    • ReportParser
  • atlantis.parsers.ordersparser
    • OrdersConsumer
    • OrdersParser
